problem.markdown: For a simple compressible system at rest, the value of[mathjaxinline]\frac{\partial(p,v)}{\partial(s,T)}[/mathjaxinline]equals 1. ( ) True (x) False [explanation] It equals -1 [explanation]
problem.p: For a simple compressible system at rest, the value of[mathjaxinline]\frac{\partial(p,v)}{\partial(s,T)}[/mathjaxinline]equals 1.
